person.persName: John H. Allison (Lawrence County, farm hand and sheriff)

body.p: Lawrence County, Kentucky, farm hand and sheriff. Kentucky native. Son of John H. Allison and Mary J. Allison. Farm hand in Lawrence County in 1850. Farm hand in Lawrence County in 1860. Sheriff of Lawrence County in 1865.
